content_markdown:
Request enhancements directly to our support team. Our team replies to 100% of the requests.

[**View Product details**](https://datatoolspro.com/tutorials/datatools-pro-explorer/) | [DataTools Pro Explorer Documentation](https://datatoolspro.com/tutorials/datatools-pro-explorer/ "DataTools Pro Explorer for Snowflake Documentation") | [Snowflake Marketplace Listing](https://app.snowflake.com/marketplace/listing/GZ1M6ZUJBYW/datatools-pro-datatools-pro-explorer "DataTools Pro Explorer Marketplace Listing")

## Have an enhancement or bug fix?

Send us an email to support@datatoolspro.com. Existing users are top priority for enhancements.

## Dec 2025 Release

Automated persistence “last query” across sessions – Triggered on query run

New query button

Rename saved queries

UX Minor labeling and icon updates for consistency

UX – Hide query during tag editing

Numerous bug fixes related to incompatible operators and data types

Edit saved explorations (excludes customized queries)

Recall and edit saved explorations

## November 2025 Release

Save exploration categories (tags) - Line of Business and Topic

Category management tab

Filter by Categories for saved queries

Tag saved queries

## October 2025 Release

Save explorations

Expand dropdown width for readability (UX)

Add measure COUNT DISTINCT

Add measure `<<row count>>` for quick addition of row counts

Minimize the select column accordion by default

Documentation for granting access to the database schema is displayed in-app by default

## Initial Release: 9-30-2025
